sentences.en: A mackerel sky and mares'tails make lofty ships carry low sails.
sentences.cn: 鱼鳞天,马尾云,大船降帆莫航行.

sentences.en: A mackerel sky is a sure sign of rain to come.
sentences.cn: 天空出现稀薄的排状斑纹云,那预兆天要下雨了.

sentences.en: A white - tailed sea eagle ( Haliaeetus albicilla ) catching a mackerel in Norway.
sentences.cn: 图上是一只白尾海雕正在挪威捕食一条鲭鱼.

sentences.en: As for oily fish, think salmon, mackerel anchovies, sardines and eel.
sentences.cn: 至于油鱼类, 可以考虑吃鲑鱼, 鲭鱼, 沙丁鱼和鳗鱼.

sentences.en: Bay leaf is an excellent herb for mackerel.
sentences.cn: 干月桂叶是烹制鲭鱼肉极佳的调味料。

sentences.en: Boats had plenty of mackerel and a few skate.
sentences.cn: 那些船上有许多鲭鱼，还有几条鳐鱼。

sentences.en: Choose oily fish such as salmon, sardines, anchovies , herring, and mackerel.
sentences.cn: 选择那些油滑的鱼类如:鲑鱼 、 沙丁鱼 、 凤尾鱼 、 青鱼和鲭鱼.

sentences.en: Fresh top - grade mackerel fillets are adopted , adding several kinds of imported seasonings.
sentences.cn: 选用优质冰鲜马鲛鱼片, 加入各种进口调味料腌制.

sentences.en: Holy mackerel ! What a way to run all army!
sentences.cn: 好家伙,这是什么指挥部队的方式 呀!

sentences.en: I felt as if I should throw him a 20 mackerel.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我应该奖励一下斯科特.

sentences.en: I usually catch fish like mackerel and horsemackerel.
Other fatty fish - mackerel, herring , sardines - should deliver similar benefits, researchers say.
sentences.cn: 其他脂质鱼 — -鲭, 青鱼, 沙丁鱼等等有着同样的好处, 研究人员称.

sentences.en: There is a large take of mackerel.
They'd gone out to fish for mackerel.
sentences.cn: 他们已经出海去捕鲭鱼。

sentences.en: Your best bet comes from the waterways: catfish, salmon, sardines, or mackerel.
sentences.cn: 最好的办法是从水产品中摄入: 鲶鱼 、 鲑鱼 、 沙丁鱼或鲭鱼.

trans.tran_cn: 鲭（产于北大西洋），马鲛鱼
trans.tran_en: a sea fish that has oily flesh and a strong taste
